about_the_game:
Cozy Exploration

Oh no! The world is flooded. But this is no time to give up hope. Build a ship and explore the remains! A variety of different islands await you. Some yield resources, some are home to unique characters. No timers, explore at your own pace.

Customize your Ship

Find all kinds of resources and recycle them to build the ship of your dreams. Grow and farm your own plants on board and convert them into bio-fuel. Or will you build a ship that's powered by sunlight or wind? The choice is yours.

Forge Connections

This world inhibits several unique characters. Get to know them and help each other out! Share your skills and you might get something in return. Together you can build a wholesome community.

Document your Journey

Equipped with a photo camera, you can make travel memories. Catalogue birds, plants, characters or just take some snapshots of pretty vistas. They all get saved into your personal journal. In the end, it’s your very own journey.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or comparable
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: built-in
  • Additional Notes: still being optimized

short_description: Seaward is a cozy exploration game where you build a ship to discover a flooded world. Find resources and power your ship with renewable energies. Meet unique characters and help them out to build a wholesome community. Make the journey your own by taking photos and filling up your journal.
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Ukrainian, French, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil
